content.rendered:
At Dan Gilroy Design, we firmly believe that the design must make a great first impression with users for a law firm website to be successful. Law firm logo design is a crucial variable in the formula for such success.

The logo is the cornerstone of your law firm’s website. It will drive the website’s color scheme, style, and overall vibe the website projects. If you have a cheap-looking logo or a logo that you created yourself in Microsoft Word, your website will look cheap, too, no matter how gifted your website designer might be. So, don’t shrug off the logo. A well-done law firm logo design can give you and your law practice the fine polish you deserve.

At Dan Gilroy Design, our graphic designers create law firm logos best described as clean, elegant, and sophisticated. In short, they are logos that make that great first impression that you need. Our designers work directly with our clients throughout the logo design process. Typically, logos can be completed in three to six weeks, depending on the number of revisions requested.
